paper.title: Smooth, Efficient, and Interruptible Zooming and Panning
author: Reach,AndrewMcCaleb
North,Chris
paper.soname: IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON VISUALIZATION AND COMPUTER GRAPHICS
paper.abstract: This paper introduces a novel technique for smooth and efficient zooming and panning based on dynamical systems in hyperbolic space. Unlike the technique of van Wijk and Nuij, the animations produced by our technique are smooth at the end-points and when interrupted by a change of target. To analyze the results of our technique, we introduce world/screen diagrams, a novel technique for visualizing zooming and panning animations.
